description: ESLint configuration file for a Svelte project, importing plugins and configurations, and setting language options.

methods.name: ts.config
methods.description: Creates an ESLint configuration object combining various recommended settings and overrides.

methods.name: includeIgnoreFile
methods.description: Includes ignore patterns from specified gitignore file into ESLint config.

methods.name: js.configs.recommended
methods.description: Provides recommended ESLint configurations for JavaScript files.

methods.name: ts.configs.recommended
methods.description: Provides recommended ESLint configurations tailored for TypeScript.

methods.name: svelte.configs.recommended
methods.description: Provides recommended ESLint configurations for Svelte files.

methods.name: fileURLToPath
methods.description: Converts a file URL to a file system path.
